epochs.label: Prisca Theologia
epochs.banner: The era of Prisca Theologia saw the rise of Wisdom and the preservation of the Tradition through Origins.

epochs.label: Late Antiquity
epochs.banner: The era of Late Antiquity saw the rise of Gnosis and the preservation of the Tradition through Theurgy.

epochs.label: Medieval
epochs.banner: The era of Medieval saw the rise of Alchemy and the preservation of the Tradition through Preservation.

epochs.label: Renaissance
epochs.banner: The era of Renaissance saw the rise of Rebirth and the preservation of the Tradition through Magic.

epochs.label: Enlightenment
epochs.banner: The era of Enlightenment saw the rise of Rosicrucian and the preservation of the Tradition through Masonry.

epochs.label: Modern
epochs.banner: The era of Modern saw the rise of Occult Revival and the preservation of the Tradition through Technology.

nodes.label: Thoth
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "The lips of wisdom are closed, except to the ears of Understanding.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Hermes Trismegistus
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "As above, so below.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Plato
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "Time is the moving image of eternity.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Plotinus
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "Withdraw into yourself and look.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Iamblichus
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "Theurgy is the signature of the gods.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Zosimos of Panopolis
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "The composition of waters.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Jabir ibn Hayyan
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "He who has not studied has not reached the goal.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Ibn Sina
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "The knowledge of anything, since all things have causes, is not acquired or complete unless it is known by its causes.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Albertus Magnus
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "Experiment is the only safe guide in such investigations.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Roger Bacon
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "For the things of this world cannot be made known without a knowledge of mathematics.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Marsilio Ficino
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "Love is the knot and link of the world.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Giovanni Pico della Mirandola
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "I have read in the records of the Arabians...", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Heinrich Cornelius Agrippa
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "All things in the world are connected.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Paracelsus
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "The dose makes the poison.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Giordano Bruno
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "The universe is infinite.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: John Dee
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "The visible world is created by the invisible.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Heinrich Khunrath
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "What good is a torch specifically for the blind?", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Michael Maier
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "Like a Phoenix from the ashes.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Robert Fludd
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "The macrocosm and the microcosm are one.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Jakob Boehme
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "In the water lives the fish, in the fire the salamander.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Isaac Newton
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "Truth is the offspring of silence and meditation.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Thomas Vaughan
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "Magic is nothing but the wisdom of the Creator revealed and planted in the creature.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Eliphas Levi
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "To know, to dare, to will, to keep silent.", "role": "Magus"}

nodes.label: Carl Jung
nodes.attributes: {"quote": "Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.", "role": "Magus"}
